default.message: Wishing you all the best on this incredible achievement!

helluva-play.message: You may say the same thing over and over, but I still love you.

elon-buys-the-jets.message:
Dear Jets Fan,
Losing sucks, but just remember it can always get worse!
Best.

rooting-for-the-birds.message: WARNING: rooting for the birds may cause high blood pressure, anxiety and palpitations.

no-pressure-drake.message:
Dear Pats Fan,
Good luck with the new job. I heard the last guy was pretty good.
Best.

michelle-ultra.message: Cheers to being exactly who you are.

cant-catch-caleb.message:
Dear Bears Fan,
I heard you had a bad day at work. Sometimes you give it your all and come up short. But you can still be great tomorrow.
Best.

meanwhile-in-venezuela.message:
Hey Son,
Congrats on the new job. Just remember if you don't like your boss, it can always be worse!
Best.

rooting-for-the-birds.message:
Dear Eagles Fan,
Happy Birthday!
Here's hoping the Birds get it together this year.
Best.

farm-to-trash.message:
Hey
January's almost over - feel free to throw your salad out!
Best.

trump-taps.message:
Hey Love
You've struck oil in my heart.
Happy Valentines, x

loot-box.message:
Hey Son,
Happy birthday - I don't know what I got you but it's heavy!
Love.

you-sleep-here.message:
Good luck with the new job.
Just remember it could always be worse!

snuggle-up.message:
You're the only deal I never want to renegotiate.
Happy Valentine's Day.
x

onion-rings.message:
Happy Valentine's Day to someone I love to roast.
x
